name: Joeleny's Restaurant
address: 133-11 Cross Bay Blvd, Ozone Park, NY 11417, USA

reviews.text:
The best food.
So juicy and tasty in affordable price.
The food is great. We went twice in one week!
2nd time here and the food and service was on point.
The chicken here is really amazing, and the rice and beans and tostada too! I always like to drink one of their special juices as well!

10/10! I was really impressed with the restaurant ‚Äî from its cleanliness, d√©cor, music, and service to, best of all, the food! I ordered the Bistec Salteado with rice and beans, and it was delicious ‚Äî generous enough to share with my child. I also enjoyed the Jamaica Jugo. üëåüèº Everything had great energy and positive vibes from everyone there. Wishing them much success! I will be returning :)
Will definitely be back!

I pass this place 4 times a day. Went in last night friendly and welcoming staff. The food was delicious and fresh. You can taste they use fresh clean oil for their fried food. I wasn‚Äôt expecting much but the food was Just amazing , so glad we tried it.
The most delicious food you can get. Chicken melts off the bone. So happy to see familiar faces at Joeleny‚Äôs after their spot on Church St. closed after over 40 years. This is a special place.

Serious flavor here. I had the chicken enchiladas and they did not disappoint, super tender chicken, fresh veggies, and tasty rice and beans. The baked chicken is also out of this world, falls right off the bone.

Here's why I know Jonnys new place will be a success. His food is  is so good it sells itself. Once word gets around it will be just like Church St. Portions are generous, you will get a delicious meal that can easily satisfy 2 people. He has a heart of gold.

I have been eating the food produced by the Mgmt. & faithful staff of this restaurant for 40 years, through all their incarnations, from the OG on Canal St, through a move to Church St., with a one time offshoot in Sunnyside, and now in Ozone Park. Delicious food made with love, generous portions at a good price. I wish them continued success!

Went an ordered 5 side orders of rice and a side of plantains. On the menu it says $6 each. When I went in I asked how big the side orders is she showed me a decent size pan. Upon paying she said it was $8 for the rice and $14 for the plantain. I would never go back based on dishonest service. Don‚Äôt have a price on your menu and charge different when paying
Excellent food and extremely warm and helpful staff.

Sooooo good.   Looking for a bite before catching a flight out of JFK.   Google had this as Spanish food but hey, it's Dominican and it is fantastic.     Delicious and huge portions.  We a caramofongo and a mofongo and both were off the hook.     No we dont have great Dominican food in the PNW....but this exceeded my memories from living in NYC.   Super friendly and fun owners.  Would give 6 stars if I could!
Food here is better than the competition  I ordered for pick up it was ready on time customer service was great I will return

One of the best Dominican food spot‚Äôs I spent my money on, the chicharron to die for, n the beans over rice is absolutely slamming. Customer service calm an cordial n there very patient. I highly recommend.

I love this restaurant!! Been going since the second week they opened. Anyone that says anything negative about this restaurant it‚Äôs because they don‚Äôt know about good quality food. They‚Äôre quick with the service and attentive. I wish them good luck and success!
üëéüèª pesimo servicio prefiero comerme una Maruchan‚Ä¶
First time, we tried "Tresgulpes" . Mengu was delicious!!! Staff is sooo..., warm & welcoming. Feels like home.... We love this place!!!
Really good rice and beans. Reasonable prices in these inflationary times.

Greetings.
This Restaurant is incredible.
Great flavor, like home and the right environment.
Gracias, muchas gracias.
Food and atmosphere was fantastic. Close to my home.love the food
Great food and service
Food is amazing must go to
Great food, great people.
Great food great atmosphere
Food is delicious and well proportioned, service is excellent and the vibe was definitely worth me and my family‚Äôs time‚Ä¶ highly recommend and will definitely be coming back in the near future..
Great place to eat great service and the food is amazing i recommend this place to anyone
Very good food great staff highly recommend
Great food and service
The best Spanish food, around cleanest place to eat highly recommended food is delicious
The staff was friendly and felt as if you knew them a while all while getting food ready fast. Absolutely delicious food. One of my favorites!
Food was delicious and flavorful! The Bistec was great! Try it you won't be disappointed!

Best place to eat.  Awesome food. Quick service. We will be back every weekend.

Efrain.

This restaurant made me feel like I was at home!
The food was amazing and the staff really made you feel like you knew them your whole life.
Definitely one of my favorite places to eat in the city!
10/10 recommend. I will definitely be back!!
Couldn‚Äôt think of a better place to eat. Service was great and the food is fantastic.
Amazing food and service, highly recommended have not had authentic cuisine like that in a very long time
Great authentic food. Staff was very friendly. Highly recommend!
